snippet: If successful, the transaction will give Suncor, Canada’s largest integrated energy company, control of Syncrude, which is Canadian Oil Sands’ only asset.
abstract: Canadian energy company Suncor announces hostile takeover bid for Canadian Oil Sands, transaction valued at 6.6 billion Canadian dollars.
lead_paragraph: If successful, the transaction will give Suncor, Canada’s largest integrated energy company, control of Syncrude, which is Canadian Oil Sands’ only asset.

headline.main: Suncor Announces Hostile Takeover Bid for Canadian Oil Sands
